{
    "id":"1",       
    "flag":"1"      // 1 for rigger pdf, 2 for transporter pdf, 3 for payduty pdf
}

when flag is '1' then id will be rigger ticket primary id
when flag is '2' then id will be transporter ticket primary id
when flag is '3' then id will be payduty form primary id
